pages.text: :root { --gutter: 25px; --radius: 13px; --color-primary: #1c6c36; --color2: #ff761e; --color3: #ffb900; --color4: #33d57a; --color5: #00dbff; --color6: #1a98ff; --color7: #9090ff; --color-primary-bg: rgba(20, 103, 10, 0.15); --color2-bg: rgba(255,118,30,0.15); --color3-bg: rgba(255,185,0,0.15); --color4-bg: rgba(51,213,122,0.15); --color5-bg: rgba(0,219,255,0.15); --color6-bg: rgba(26,152,255,0.15); --color7-bg: rgba(144,144,255,0.15); --color-shadow: rgba(161, 177, 204, 0.4); }
